mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select r.r_num r_num, c.name name, r.userid userid, r.score score, to_char(writedate, 'MM/DD') writedate, r.grade grade from review r join course c on r.c_num=c.c_num order by r_num desc) where rownum<=#{param1} order by r_num asc) where rownum<=#{param2} order by r_num desc
select * from review where score=10 and grade='공개'
